CustomField.formula: IF( Campaign.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'EV_Eventos_Accionistas', $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlAccionistaPortal__c , $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlPortal__c ) & $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_Baja__c & IF(ISBLANK(LeadId), IF(ISBLANK(ContactId),IF(ISBLANK(AccountId),'es',CASE(Account.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(Contact.Account.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(Lead.EV_Idiomas__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')) & $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_html__c & '?idEvento=' & Campaign.EV_ExternalID__c & '&idInvitacion='& EV_ExternalID__c
CustomField.label: URL Baja Inscripcion
